description: A long but enjoyable hike on an immaculate, well signed trail with about 700 meters of  elevation gain and 17 km.
directions: Exit 250 off I-5 then route 11 to trailhead.  Route 11 SOuth,  also known as Chuckanut Drive, will be the route to follow past Larrabee State Park.  Once you pass Oyster Bar the pull off is just ahead less than 0.5 kilometer on right hand side.
title: Oyster Dome
